1.content:
Alright this is where I’ll leave you to your own devices but here’s a little bit more background to the characters

Cassandra- Also goes by Cassie for short. Very shy and total klutz. Fashionista and hates being dirty.

Clair- Best Friend to Cassandra since childhood but not very protective of her. Flirtatious and high libido.

June- Absolute slob. Not very smart but an avid gamer. Very insecure and hatred for fashion/makeup.

Whitney- Trans woman. Loves exercise. Very oblivious but loves to make friends.

Mercedes- Trans woman. Daddies Girl that gets what she wants. Likes to be in charge. Bit of a bitch all around.

info.brief_description: Take any one of my OC’s and basically go wild! Sky’s the limit!
info.description:
I’ll give you brief descriptions of my characters and it’s up to you to put them in any fetish material you can think of! Mixing with other OC’s is highly encouraged!

As for the characters your choices are:
Cassandra- Cocker Spaniel girl with short black hair. 5’4 in height and weighing 145 pounds.

Clair- Shortstack Lion Girl with pink and white hair. 4’9 in height and weighing 190 pounds

June- Fat Whitetail Deer girl with jet black hair. 7’9 in height and weighing 300 pounds.

Whitney- Trans Wolf girl with white hair and one blue highlight. 6’2 in height and weighing 190 pounds

Mercedes- Trans Red Panda girl with reddish brown hair. 6’2 in height and weighing 100 pounds. Extremely wealthy

And that’s all of them! Have fun with my girls!
